gold_rationale: Change control and testing gaps ⇒ CM-3; SA-11.

text: Multiple failed logins from 10.0.5.12 to auth-service; account svc-app not locked after 5 attempts.
gold_rationale: Lockout threshold not enforced; correlated via audit review ⇒ AC-7; AU-6.

text: S3 bucket finance-archive not encrypted at rest; KMS key reused across apps.
gold_rationale: At-rest encryption and key management gaps ⇒ SC-28; SC-12.

text: NTP drift 62s on db-01; not synced to authoritative time source.
gold_rationale: Clock drift jeopardizes timestamp integrity ⇒ AU-8.

text: API gateway rate limiting disabled; prior DDoS impacted availability.
gold_rationale: DoS protection missing; boundary controls implicated ⇒ SC-5; SC-7.

text: API gateway rate limiting disabled; prior DDoS impacted availability.
gold_rationale: DoS protection missing; boundary controls implicated ⇒ SC-5; SC-7.

text: The weekly backup verification script reported that the latest full backup of the 'customer-data' database is unreadable. An I/O error was encountered during the integrity check, indicating a corrupted backup set.
gold_rationale: Automated testing of information system backups has detected a critical failure

text: A review of the VPN concentrator's configuration shows that it does not enforce a session timeout for active connections. User sessions can remain open indefinitely, increasing the risk of hijacking.
gold_rationale: The remote access solution is not configured to terminate sessions after a defined period

text: Incident IR-2026-060: The SOC is investigating a high volume of outbound traffic from an internal server to multiple unknown IP addresses. The traffic is encrypted (TLS), but the pattern is anomalous and suggests data exfiltration.
gold_rationale: System monitoring detected anomalous network behavior which has triggered the incident handling process

text: The SIEM alerted that the security audit log on 'dc-02' was cleared by user 'admin'. This action, which erases evidence of activity, was not associated with any approved change ticket.
gold_rationale: An unauthorized attempt to tamper with audit generation mechanisms was detected and requires review

text: A new server was deployed using the official golden image. A post-deployment scan confirmed that all security agents are installed and reporting to their central consoles, and the OS is fully patched.
gold_rationale: A new system was successfully deployed in accordance with the secure baseline configuration

text: The password policy for privileged accounts is set to require a password change every 90 days. However, an audit found 15 privileged accounts with passwords older than one year, indicating the policy is not being enforced.
gold_rationale: Authenticator management policy for password rotation is not being technically enforced

text: The external vulnerability scan detected that the company's SFTP server is allowing the use of weak SSH ciphers (e.g., arcfour) and MAC algorithms (e.g., hmac-md5). These should be disabled.
gold_rationale: Vulnerability scanning has identified the use of weak non-compliant cryptographic algorithms

text: A user has been granted read-only access to a specific folder on a network share. The access request was approved by the data owner and is documented in this ticket. The user has been notified.
gold_rationale: An account management action (granting access) was performed with proper authorization

text: The anti-malware agent on the primary mail gateway has crashed and is not running. All incoming and outgoing email is currently not being scanned for malicious attachments.
gold_rationale: The malicious code protection mechanism on a critical boundary device has failed

text: A review of the 'Finance' Active Directory group found that a user from the IT department is a member. The user does not have a business need for this access, and they have been removed from the group.
gold_rationale: A violation of the principle of least privilege was identified and remediated

text: An employee's corporate laptop was stolen. The incident response team confirmed the device had disk encryption enabled, disabled the user's accounts, and initiated a remote wipe, but the device never came online.
gold_rationale: The incident handling process for a lost asset included account management and verifying data encryption

text: The development team's code repository contains a text file with the usernames and passwords for all of their test environment databases. These credentials should be stored in a secure secrets vault, not in source control.
gold_rationale: An insecure practice in developer testing has led to a failure in authenticator management

text: The system clock on a database server is 45 seconds out of sync with the domain controllers. This is causing intermittent authentication failures for applications that connect to it.
gold_rationale: A time synchronization failure is impacting system availability and operations

text: The change management board has approved the deployment of a new security patch for the company's primary firewall. The change is scheduled for the next maintenance window.
gold_rationale: A flaw remediation is being managed through the formal change control process

text: The software inventory scan has found 10 workstations running a version of Adobe Reader from 2015. This version is end-of-life and has numerous unpatched critical vulnerabilities.
gold_rationale: The system component inventory has identified software with flaws that cannot be remediated

text: The SIEM is not configured to generate alerts for any events from the company's new cloud platform. Logs are being collected, but no one is being notified of potential security issues like failed logins or policy violations.
gold_rationale: The configuration for audit review and analysis is not effective for a major system component

text: A user account that was disabled three months ago has been automatically deleted by the identity management system. This is in accordance with the data retention policy for disabled accounts.
gold_rationale: The account management lifecycle process is being successfully automated

text: The organization has no process for performing security code reviews. All code is written by a single developer and pushed directly to production without any peer review or automated scanning.
gold_rationale: The requirement for developer security testing and evaluation is not being met

text: The 'Corp-IoT' wireless network, which is used for devices like smart TVs and security cameras, is not segmented from the main corporate network. A compromise of a smart TV could lead to an attack on a domain controller.
gold_rationale: The wireless network is not properly segmented from the trusted internal network

text: The file integrity monitoring agent on 'db-prod-01' has been disabled. The agent was consuming too much CPU and was turned off by the system administrator. It has been off for 3 days.
gold_rationale: The information integrity monitoring tool has been disabled on a critical server

text: A user has been locked out of their account after 5 failed login attempts. This is the correct behavior according to the policy.
gold_rationale: The unsuccessful logon attempt policy is being successfully enforced

text: The organization does not have multi-factor authentication for any remote access. All users, including administrators, connect to the VPN using only a username and password.
gold_rationale: The remote access solution does not enforce the use of multi-factor authentication

text: The audit log for the main file server does not record when a user reads a file, it only records writes and deletes. This makes it impossible to know if an attacker is exfiltrating data by reading it.
gold_rationale: The system is not configured to generate auditable events for all required security actions

text: A user who was terminated 6 weeks ago was found to still have a valid, active account in the company's primary cloud application. The offboarding checklist for this user was never completed.
gold_rationale: A failure in the account management de-provisioning process was discovered

text: The network firewall is blocking a large number of inbound connections from a known malicious IP address. The firewall is correctly using its threat intelligence feed to block known bad actors.
gold_rationale: Boundary protection controls are successfully blocking traffic from known malicious sources

text: The main application's login form is not protected against automated attacks. An attacker could use a simple script to attempt millions of password combinations without being blocked or rate-limited.
gold_rationale: The system lacks controls for both unsuccessful logon attempts and application-level denial-of-service

text: A vulnerability scan has found that the company's external web server is vulnerable to the 'BEAST' attack because it supports TLS 1.0. This protocol and its associated ciphers should be disabled.
gold_rationale: The system is configured to use a non-compliant insecure cryptographic protocol for data in transit

text: The SIEM has detected that a user account was used to log into 100 different workstations in under a minute. This is impossible for a human and is a clear sign that the account has been compromised and is being used by malware to spread.
gold_rationale: System monitoring has detected anomalous behavior indicative of malware propagation

text: The organization has no documented incident response plan. In the event of a breach, the team would have no predefined steps to follow, leading to a chaotic and ineffective response.
gold_rationale: The requirement to have a documented incident handling capability has not been met

text: The password for the shared 'WiFi-Guest' network is written on a sign at the reception desk. The password has not been changed in over a year. This is an insecure practice.
gold_rationale: The authenticator for the wireless network is publicly disclosed and not rotated

text: Incident IR-2026-065: The SIEM alerted on anomalous data egress from a database server. Investigation found an unpatched vulnerability allowed an attacker access. The server has been isolated and is being rebuilt from a clean backup.
gold_rationale: An incident was triggered by system monitoring due to a failure in flaw remediation

text: The 'Everyone' group has been granted the 'Full Control' permission on the root of the system drive of a production server. This allows any user on the network to delete critical operating system files.
gold_rationale: Permissions are not configured to enforce the principle of least privilege

text: A new user was provisioned with a default password that they were required to change on first login. The system correctly enforced the password change. The process was successful.
gold_rationale: The authenticator management process for initial password change is working as expected

text: The company's data backup tapes are stored in a closet in the same data center as the production servers. A fire or flood in the data center would destroy both the primary data and all of the backups.
gold_rationale: The contingency plan is flawed because backups are not stored at an off-site location

text: A developer has submitted a pull request for a new feature. The automated SAST scanner in the CI/CD pipeline has completed its scan and found no new high or critical severity vulnerabilities.
gold_rationale: Developer security testing has been successfully completed for a new code change

text: The log files for the main application contain the user's full credit card number and CVV code in plain text. This is a severe violation of PCI DSS and a major data security risk.
gold_rationale: The content of audit records contains highly sensitive data that should never be logged

text: A critical patch for the company's firewall was deployed last night during the scheduled maintenance window. The deployment was successful and the firewall is no longer vulnerable.
gold_rationale: A required flaw remediation has been successfully completed

text: The system clock on a server is 3 hours fast. The server is not configured to use any NTP server and the time was set manually and has drifted significantly.
gold_rationale: A failure to implement time synchronization has led to a major clock drift

text: The inventory of servers in the CMDB is out of date. It is missing 20 new servers that were deployed last month and still contains entries for 10 servers that were decommissioned.
gold_rationale: The system component inventory is not being maintained in an accurate or timely manner

text: The antivirus agent on a user's machine has been disabled. The user has administrative rights on their machine and has turned off the agent because they believe it slows down their computer.
gold_rationale: Malicious code protection has been disabled by a user leaving the endpoint at risk

text: The help desk has a shared administrator password that is used by all team members. When an action is performed with this account, it is impossible to know which of the team members actually performed it.
gold_rationale: The use of a shared identifier violates the principle of individual accountability

text: The 'secure' baseline for a new server has been successfully applied using an automation script. This ticket tracks the completion of that task. The server is now ready for the application to be installed.
gold_rationale: The approved baseline configuration has been successfully applied to a new system

text: A user account was found to be a member of the 'Domain Admins' group. The user is a summer intern and should not have any administrative privileges. The access has been revoked and an investigation has been opened.
gold_rationale: A critical violation of least privilege has been discovered triggering an incident response

text: The SIEM is ingesting logs from all required sources, and the logs are being parsed correctly. The data is available for searching and alerting. The system is functioning normally.
gold_rationale: The audit generation and collection system is functioning as expected

text: The organization's main database, which contains sensitive customer PII, is not encrypted. The server is physically secure, but a theft of the backup tapes would result in a data breach.
gold_rationale: The requirement to protect information at rest is not being met for a critical system

text: The vulnerability scanner is configured to run with a low-privileged user account. As a result, it cannot perform authenticated scans and is not able to detect missing patches or local configuration issues.
gold_rationale: The vulnerability monitoring tool is not configured to be effective

text: A user who was fired for cause was found to have logged into the VPN and downloaded a large number of sensitive files the day after their termination. Their account was not disabled in a timely manner.
gold_rationale: A critical failure in the account management de-provisioning process has resulted in a data breach

text: The log retention policy is to keep logs for 1 year. The logs are being successfully archived to long-term storage and are protected from modification. The process is working.
gold_rationale: The process for audit record retention is meeting all requirements

text: The weekly review of privileged user activity has been completed. All actions were found to be authorized and documented in the change management system.
gold_rationale: The required audit review and analysis process has been successfully completed

text: A change was deployed to the main application without being tested. The change caused a critical bug that prevented users from logging in for 2 hours. The change had to be rolled back.
gold_rationale: A failure to follow the change control process resulted in a major service outage

text: Incident IR-2026-070: A user's account was compromised. The attacker used the account to access the user's email, but was blocked from accessing any other applications because of MFA. The user's password has been reset.
gold_rationale: Multi-factor authentication successfully limited the impact of an incident involving a compromised account

text: The file integrity monitor has been disabled on all web servers. The operations team claims it causes too much noise, but this leaves the servers vulnerable to undetected tampering.
gold_rationale: The mechanism for ensuring information integrity has been disabled across a class of systems

text: The SIEM has detected a user account that has had one failed login attempt on every account in the domain. This is a classic password spraying attack. The source IP of the attack has been blocked.
gold_rationale: System monitoring has successfully detected and responded to a common attack pattern

text: A new user has been provisioned. They have been granted the standard set of permissions for their role. This is a routine and successful account management action.
gold_rationale: A routine account management provisioning action was completed

text: The 'Everyone' group has been granted write access to a network share where the company's financial reports are stored. This means any employee can modify or delete these critical documents.
gold_rationale: Permissions on a sensitive data store are not configured to enforce least privilege

text: A server was found to be missing from the backup jobs. The server was built 3 months ago but was never added to the backup policy. If the server were to fail, all of its data would be lost.
gold_rationale: A system is not being backed up due to a failure in the management process

text: The password for the administrator account on the company's primary database is 'database123'. This is a weak password that could be easily guessed by an attacker.
gold_rationale: A critical authenticator is not being managed in a secure manner

text: The company's external website is vulnerable to a denial-of-service attack. The search feature can be abused to run very complex queries that consume all of the database's CPU, causing the site to crash.
gold_rationale: The system lacks required protections against application-level denial-of-service attacks

text: The SIEM has detected that a user account was used to access a sensitive file, and then the audit log on that server was cleared 5 minutes later. This is highly suspicious and the user's account has been disabled.
gold_rationale: System monitoring has detected an attempt to tamper with audit generation mechanisms

text: The static code analysis tool in the CI/CD pipeline has been disabled because the developers complained that it was too slow. This means that code is now being deployed without any automated security scanning.
gold_rationale: The required developer security testing process has been disabled

text: A user has been locked out of their account after 5 failed login attempts. The lockout is for 30 minutes, as per the security policy. This is the correct behavior.
gold_rationale: The unsuccessful logon attempt policy is being successfully enforced

text: The organization does not have an accurate inventory of its servers. An automated scan found 50 servers that were not in the CMDB. These 'shadow IT' servers are not being patched, monitored, or backed up.
gold_rationale: A failure in inventory management has led to gaps in flaw remediation and contingency planning

text: The time on a critical server is off by 20 minutes. The server is not configured to use NTP and is relying on its hardware clock, which has drifted.
gold_rationale: A failure to implement time synchronization has led to a significant clock drift

text: A patch for a critical vulnerability in the company's VPN software has been released. The patch needs to be deployed within 24 hours. A change ticket has been opened to track the emergency deployment.
gold_rationale: Flaw remediation is being managed for a critical remote access component

text: The baseline configuration for a new server was successfully applied. The server is hardened and compliant with the corporate security policy.
gold_rationale: The approved baseline configuration has been successfully applied to a new system

text: A user in the HR department was found to have administrative access to the company's primary web server. There is no business justification for this access, and it has been revoked.
gold_rationale: A violation of the principle of least privilege was identified and remediated

text: The audit log for the main application does not record the 'before' and 'after' values for changes. This makes it impossible to determine what data was actually changed by a user.
gold_rationale: The content of audit records is insufficient for its intended security purpose

text: The organization's main web application is using an SSL certificate that expired last week. This is causing security warnings for users and means that the connection is no longer trusted.
gold_rationale: A failure in authenticator lifecycle management has resulted in a failure of transmission confidentiality

text: An EDR agent has detected a user trying to run a known password-dumping tool. The tool was blocked and the user's workstation was automatically isolated from the network.
gold_rationale: Malicious code was successfully detected and blocked by the endpoint protection solution

text: A user has been granted temporary access to a sensitive project folder for the duration of the project. The access will automatically expire in 3 months. The access was approved by the project manager.
gold_rationale: Temporary account management is being used to enforce access control

text: The vulnerability scan has found that the organization's external firewall is itself vulnerable to a remote code execution flaw. This is a critical risk that needs to be remediated immediately.
gold_rationale: Vulnerability scanning has identified a critical flaw in a boundary protection device

text: An incident has been opened after the company's primary database was encrypted by ransomware. The incident response team has been activated and is working to restore the data from backups.
gold_rationale: The incident handling process has been initiated in response to a major security breach

text: The 'Corp-Secure' wireless network is configured to use WPA3, the most current and secure standard. All employee devices are required to use this network. This is a secure configuration.
gold_rationale: The wireless access solution is configured with strong cryptographic protections

text: The logs from the company's new cloud application are being successfully forwarded to the SIEM. The logs are being parsed correctly and are available for analysis. The integration is working.
gold_rationale: The audit generation and transmission mechanism is working as expected

text: The latest review of the incident response plan has been completed. The plan was updated to include contact information for the company's new cyber insurance provider.
gold_rationale: The incident handling plan is being maintained and kept up-to-date

text: A change was deployed to the production environment that had not been approved by the change advisory board. The change caused an outage and had to be rolled back. The process was not followed.
gold_rationale: The change control process was bypassed resulting in an operational impact

text: The main file server, which contains sensitive intellectual property, does not have data-at-rest encryption enabled. A physical theft of the server would result in a major data breach.
gold_rationale: The requirement to protect information at rest is not being met for a critical system

text: The SIEM has detected a user account that is generating thousands of failed login attempts against other user accounts. This is a clear sign of a password spraying attack originating from a compromised machine.
gold_rationale: System monitoring has successfully detected a common attack pattern

text: The password for the administrator account on the company's primary web server is '123456'. This is a violation of all password complexity and length policies.
gold_rationale: A critical authenticator is not being managed in a secure manner

text: A user has been granted access to a new system. The user was assigned the 'user' role, which is the role with the least privilege necessary for them to perform their job duties.
gold_rationale: The principle of least privilege was correctly applied during an account management action

text: A user has been locked out after 5 failed login attempts. This is correct.
gold_rationale: The unsuccessful logon attempt policy is being enforced

text: The daily backup of the main file server completed successfully.
gold_rationale: The information system backup process is working

text: The firewall successfully blocked an incoming connection from a known malicious IP.
gold_rationale: The boundary protection control is working

text: A new user account was successfully created and granted standard permissions.
gold_rationale: A routine account management action was completed

text: The vulnerability scan for the month of May has completed successfully.
gold_rationale: The vulnerability monitoring process is being executed

text: The system clock on the main web server is accurate and is being synchronized with the corporate NTP server.
gold_rationale: Time synchronization is being successfully maintained

text: A user has successfully connected to the VPN using their password and MFA.
gold_rationale: A successful remote access event using MFA has been logged

text: The EDR agent has been successfully deployed to a new workstation.
gold_rationale: The malicious code protection tool has been successfully deployed

text: The CI/CD pipeline successfully completed a SAST scan on a new code commit.
gold_rationale: The developer security testing process is being executed

text: A user has been granted access to a folder, and the approval is on file.
gold_rationale: An account management action was completed

text: An old and unused user account was disabled during a periodic review. This cleanup reduces the attack surface and aligns with the least privilege principle.
gold_rationale: The account management review process is being used to enforce least privilege

text: The SIEM detected a user account attempting to RDP to a domain controller from a workstation. This access pattern is a violation of the tiering model and was blocked by a host-based firewall rule.
gold_rationale: System monitoring detected a least privilege violation which was blocked by boundary controls

text: The corporate role-based access control matrix has been reviewed and updated. The update removes unnecessary permissions from several roles, better enforcing the principle of least privilege.
gold_rationale: The access control model is being reviewed and maintained

text: A user account that was terminated last month was discovered to still be active. The account has now been disabled. A review of the offboarding process has been initiated.
gold_rationale: A failure in the account management de-provisioning process was found

text: The password policy has been updated to require a minimum of 15 characters. The new policy has been successfully applied to all user accounts.
gold_rationale: The authenticator management policy has been successfully updated

text: A change to the production environment was made without a change ticket. The change has been retroactively documented, and the user has been reminded of the correct process.
gold_rationale: The change control process was not followed correctly

text: The full disk encryption on a user's laptop was found to be disabled. The user has been instructed to re-enable it immediately. This is a violation of the baseline configuration for laptops.
gold_rationale: A deviation from the secure configuration baseline for data-at-rest protection was found

text: A user's account has been successfully re-enabled after they returned from a leave of absence. Their permissions have been reviewed and are still appropriate for their role.
gold_rationale: A routine account management action was completed

text: The weekly review of privileged user activity has found no anomalies. All actions were authorized. The review is complete.
gold_rationale: The required audit review and analysis process has been completed

text: An incident has been opened to track a denial-of-service attack. The team has been assembled and is working on mitigation. The process is being followed.
gold_rationale: The incident handling process has been initiated
